properties.description: Omit any initial articles
properties.title: Title (Required)

properties.description: Use Your Local List or Try Searching Library of Congress Linked Authorities and Vocabularies
properties.title: Creator/Contributor Information

properties.description: Select person, corporate. conference/meeting or family
properties.title: Name Type

properties.description: Examples are: "Smith, J.J. (John Jay), 1909-1998" or "University of Connecticut" or "Mayflower (Ship)" or "World War (1939-1945)". Omit quotes when entering data.
properties.title: Creator/Contributor

properties.description: Use LC Relator Terms. Examples include: Creator, Photographer, Artist, Contributor.
properties.title: Role (Required)

properties.description: Select from the drop down list. For Collection Level Records, select "mixed material".
properties.title: Resource Type

properties.description: Use Your Local List or Try Searching Getty's Art and Architecture Thesaurus. Examples include: photographs, administrative records, notes.
properties.title: Genre Term(s)

properties.description: This includes information on release, issue, created or published.
properties.title: Information on Origination

properties.description: Enter the place of publication
properties.title: Place of Publication

properties.description: Enter a publisher
properties.title: Publisher

properties.description: Use the w3cdtf format: YYYY or YYYY-MM or YYYY-MM-DD
properties.title: Enter A Single Date

properties.description: Enter YYYY, YYYY-MM, YYYY-MM-DD
properties.title: Date

properties.description: Use the w3cdtf format: YYYY or YYYY-MM or YYYY-MM-DD
properties.title: Enter A Date Range

properties.description: Enter YYYY, YYYY-MM, YYYY-MM-DD
properties.title: Start Date

properties.description: Enter YYYY, YYYY-MM, YYYY-MM-DD
properties.title: End Date

properties.description: Enter the form or medium. Examples include: black and white, color.
properties.title: Form/Medium

properties.description: Enter the IANA MIME Type such as image/jpg, image/jp2, image/tiff, video/mp4, audio/mp3, application/PDF. Search IANA MIME Type List. Examples include: image/jpg, video/mp4, audio/mp3.
properties.title: Digital Format

properties.description: Enter whether the resource was digitized (reformatted digital) or born digital.
properties.title: Digital Origin
Is this resource a part of CHI?

properties.description: Enter the historical or current address associated with this resource.
properties.title: Historic or Current Address

properties.description: Enter the name of the parent collection
properties.title: Source

properties.description: Enter the name of the institution that is a steward for the resource
properties.title: Ownership (Required)

properties.description: Use Your Local List or Try Search Library of Congress Linked Authorities and Vocabularies
Enter the coordinates corresponding to the smallest geographic area or the address provided.
properties.title: Coordinates

properties.description: Examples are: "Smith, J.J. (John Jay), 1909-1998" or "University of Connecticut" or "Mayflower (Ship)" or "World War (1939-1945)". Omit quotes when entering data.
properties.title: Creator/Contributor

properties.description: For any url's or url, select Link. Otherwise, select "Local"
properties.title: Identifiers

properties.description: URI or Local
properties.title: Type

properties.description: Enter a statement on use and re-use of the resource
properties.title: Rights Statement on Use (Required)

properties.description: Enter the name of the organization or person creating this MODS record
properties.title: Content Source
